item.title: AbbVie Seeks To Expand Psychiatry Pipeline By Acquiring Gilgamesh’s Lead Candidate For Up To $1.2B
item.description: Gilgamesh's Bretisilocin is in clinical development for treating patients with moderate-to-severe major depressive disorder.

item.title: XRP Mastercard To Launch Today Amid Renewed Institutional Momentum
item.description: Funded by a $75 million investment from Ripple and Gemini, the card is expected to offer up to 4% cashback in XRP on everyday purchases.
